text: Hi Everyone - I created an active list and now want to send email to this list using workflow. I have Marketing Professional plan but emailing I need Marketing Enterprise plan. Is there any alrernate where I can send email to my list using workflow?
Are you sure you have Marketing Hub ? Marketing emails are included in Marketing Starter, Pro and Enterprise.
I have created a custom action in my connected app locally using python code..In my HubSpot account where can i view this action?
